Class QHamster_FV

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Hamster
        • RL_GridWorldAgent
          • ActorCritic_Hamster_FV
            • QHamster_FV
  • public class QHamster_FV
extends ActorCritic_Hamster_FV
    A hamster agent with Q-learning using feature vectors. For comparison with stochastic policy-building actor-critic policy gradient. Begleitmaterial zum Buch: "Reinforcement Learning - Aktuelle Ansätze verstehen mit Java und Greenfoot" von Uwe Lorenz. https://www.springer.com/de/book/9783662616505 https://www.facebook.com/ReinforcementLearningMitJava Lizenzierung CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0 DE Namensnennung – Nicht Kommerziell – Weitergabe unter gleichen Bedingungen Kontakt: lorenz@x-ai.eu www.x-ai.eu
    Version:
    1.0 (23.2.2020)
    Author:
    Uwe Lorenz

      • P_EpsilonGreedy_Policy

        public double[] P_EpsilonGreedy_Policy​(int n,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> A_s,
                                       java.lang.String s_key)
        Assigns a probability distribution to a state over the set of possible actions according to epsilon-greedy action selection strategy.
        Parameters:
        n - number of sucessor states
        A_s - List of action options available to the agent at the given time in s.
        s_key - key for given state s
        Returns:
        probability distribution for actions a in [0,1,...,n-1].

      • getActionWithMaxQ

        protected java.lang.Integer getActionWithMaxQ​(java.lang.String s_key)
        Gets the action with the largest Q value for a given state. If there are several Q_max actions with the same value, they are selected randomly. If there are no Q-values, then -1 is returned.
        Parameters:
        s_key - state key
        Returns:
        Action with greatest Q-value stored for the state s. Null if state is unknown.

        Returns:
        greatest Q-value stored for the state s. Null if state is unknown.
